snippet: The woman was sentenced on Wednesday after pleading guilty to manslaughter for killing Sunando Sen in 2012 at the 40th Street-Lowery Street subway station in Sunnyside, Queens.
abstract: Erika Menendez, who confessed to manslaughter after killing Hindu man by shoving him off New York City subway platform, is sentenced to 24 years in prison; admitted that she targeted Sunando Sen for religious reasons.
lead_paragraph: The woman was sentenced on Wednesday after pleading guilty to manslaughter for killing Sunando Sen in 2012 at the 40th Street-Lowery Street subway station in Sunnyside, Queens.

headline.main: 24 Years in Prison for Woman Who Pushed Man Onto Subway Tracks
